msbt.message: Hey, , remember how I was talking about maybe moving the other day? I decided to stay since asked me not to move away!So you'll still see me around!

You can relax, ! I've decided to stay on this island after all! I was totes serious about heading out, but changed my mind when asked me to stay!I guess needs me here as their local celebrity.So nothing's going to change! Sorry if I worried you! Laters!

Hey, ! You can forget all that moving talk! I'm going to staaaaaay!I asked for advice and got the best life tip If I move, I have to get famous again!I totes thought it'd be fab to move, but everybody here already knows meAnd I LOVE this island! I'm here for good, !

Hey, ? You know how I was thinking about moving out? Some stuff has happened, and I've decided to stay here!Sorry if I made your day damp! Or something. It sounded better in my head.Well, since I'm staying, we've got to hang out a bunch, 'K?
